artist: Designer: Henry Dreyfuss; Draftsman: Alvin R. Tilley
description: technical drawings of a standing woman and child at right; child has PR arm held out at 45 degrees; woman holds PR arm straight out above child's head; seated female figure seen from PL in LRC with child above and to right seen from same angle; both seated figures have PL arm held with elbow bent at 90 degrees and PL hand in a fist; PR arms stretched out straight; measurements marked on figures
inscription:
Title, Signature and Inscription

below standing figure of boy, in black ink: [(c) 1955 Henry Dreyfuss]
medium: Black marker over graphite on blue linen
provenance: Henry Dreyfuss Associates, New York, 1955-1996;  private collection, St. Paul, 1996-2010; gave to MIA
signed: URQ, in black marker: [This is JOSEPHINE (underlined) / the average American female--and JOE JR (underlined) / a typical 6 year old]; URC, in blue pencil: [This is Josephine / the average American / adult female (circled) or woman / and Joe Jr. a / typical 6 yr. youth]; LRC, in pencil: [Correct as (underlined) of 1/20/55 / ART.]
title: This is Josephine, the Average American Female and Joe Jr. a Typical 6 Year Old
